name: Feedback
objective:
Write the sum of all %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs on the top egg. At the end, the top %%icon icon-egg$%% egg must be in the same place as at the beginning.

%%icon mdi mdi mdi-alert-octagon-outline$%% Do not write anything other than the sum of the eggs on the top %%icon icon-egg$%% egg. You can write whatever you want on the other %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs.
loss_reason_wrong_sum_on_egg: A hero wrote something else than the sum of the eggs on the top egg
